actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend compulsory OASDI and medicare coverage to State and local government employees hired after December 31, 1989, or performing service after such date not subject to any public retirement system.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to extend compulsory OASDI coverage to State and local government employees hired after December 31, 1989. Makes compulsory OASDI and Medicare (title XVIII of the Act) coverage applicable to services performed by State and local government employees after such date if such services are not subject to a public retirement plan. (Currently, compulsory Medicare coverage is provided to State and local government employees hired after March 1986.)

titles.title: A bill to extend compulsory OASDI and medicare coverage to State and local government employees hired after December 31, 1989, or performing service after such date not subject to any public retirement system.
